Description_lang: Channels shadow flame over a large area, effectively denying access to a portion of the platform atop Wyrmrest Temple.  Usable until cancelled or interrupted.
AuraDescription_lang: Channeling shadow flame over a large area atop Wyrmrest Temple.  Victims within the area of effect will take $105579s1 shadow damage every $t1 seconds they are caught within the affected area.  Interrupting this ability will prevent this drake from further use of this ability.
